text: Slasher|alt=Black background with the word "SLASHER" in red stylized text Slasher is a Canadian horror anthology television series created by Aaron Martin which premiered on March 4, 2016 on Chiller. The series' licensing rights were purchased by Netflix in January 2017 and the following seasons were released exclusively via Netflix's web streaming service. The second season was released on October 17, 2017. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Season 1: The Executioner (2016)=== === Season 2: Guilty Party (2017) === ===Season 3: Solstice (2019)=== ==References== ==External links== * * Slasher
